name: Piggy the Bank
description:
Meet Piggy.

Piggy is a bank. But not just some ordinary bank, no! Piggy is nothing less than a master-crafted ceramic piggy bank, one of its kind. State of the art, really.
As all piggy banks, Piggy is drawn to coins – it has an insatiable desire for collecting all the coins his small universe can offer. But there's a danger lurking nearby – the Collector, a hammer-wielding entity with the same goal as the Piggy. And the Collector won't hesitate to bang the Piggy to get all its coins!

But Piggy is not about to give up its savings.

So it starts running.

CONTROLS

LEFT, RIGHT: movement speed

UP: jump

DOWN: drop coin

Z: back

X: start game
